comments.body:
> NotImplemented (501) over ServiceUnavailable (503)?

Oh, these are just random constant values?  Can you shift the new ones out of the HTTP error code ranges?

These are the errors returned by Etcd

On Thu, Nov 5, 2015 at 8:49 AM, David Eads notifications@github.com wrote:

> In pkg/tools/interfaces.go
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/16807#discussion_r44012447
> :
> 
> > @@ -25,6 +25,8 @@ const (
> >     EtcdErrorCodeTestFailed    = 101
> >     EtcdErrorCodeNodeExist     = 105
> >     EtcdErrorCodeValueRequired = 200
> > -   EtcdErrorCodeWatchExpired  = 401
> > -   EtcdErrorCodeUnreachable   = 501
> 
> NotImplemented (501) over ServiceUnavailable (503)?
> 
> Oh, these are just random constant values? Can you shift the new ones out
> of the HTTP error code ranges?
>
